name: random_profiles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fake_data_generator.
Tool description: With this API you can generate fake random data with different predefined layouts or define your own layout.
API description: Generates a list of fake user profiles given a specified size using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

size.description: A string indicating the number of fake user profiles to generate. Defaults to '1'.
